title: ECW Holiday Hell 2000 (Behind Closed Doors) RFVideo x264 DVDRip
description:
Extreme Championship Wrestling "Holiday Hell 2000" Event

*The last original ECW pro wrestling show in the ECW Arena held on December 23rd, 2000 in Philadelphia, PA*

This is the mostly uncut version of the event, until now, never released in its entirety.  Not a fancam but released by RFVideo as part of the Behind Closed Doors series.  The event was found in Tommy Dreamer's basement with everything but the commentary intact.  The show includes two sets of audio.  One with Tommy Dreamer & Danny Doring, recorded modern day, providing shoot style commentary and humor.  The other is with no commentary.

Matchlist:
1. The Blue Boy w/Jasmin St. Claire vs. Chilly Willy - Rhino appears...
2. Danny Doring & Roadkill vs. Da Baldies (Angel & Tony DeVito)
3. Balls Mahoney vs. Bilvis Wesley
4. "Hardcore TV" introduction with Joey Styles & Joel Gertner
5. Jerry Lynn vs. "Little" Spike Dudley
6. Super Crazy vs. CW Anderson
7. Nova vs. EZ Money
8. Tommy Dreamer, Christian York & Joey Matthews vs. Hot Commodity (Chris Hamrick, EZ Money & Julio DiNero)
9. Mikey Whipwreck & Yoshihiro Tajiri vs. The FBI (Little Guido & Tony Mamaluke) *2 out of 3 Falls Match*
10. The Sandman vs. Steve Corino vs. Justin Credible w/Francine (Three Way Dance - ECW World Heavyweight Title)
*The infamous chair throwing incident is repeated!!*

Source: DVD
Format: MP4
Codec: H.264 (or AVC)
Resolution: 720x480
Audio: 192k
Frame Rate: 29.97 fps
Language: English
Genre:  Sports (Professional Wrestling)
Run Time: Approx. 2 Hours 27 Minutes

Video sample and screenshots Included for you to check out and give you an idea of quality and show.

*NOTE!!  I have a very slow upload.  Please be patient and help me out with the seeding.  This show was professionally recorded by ECW in 2000 in fullscreen but was presented in widescreen with right and left bars by RFVideo, I've encoded it exactly as it was released by RFVideo, no crops or cuts were made*
